info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 3:44PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CHAVES COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Hagerman, or 13 miles northeast of Artesia, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hagerman and Lake Arthur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
